text: And if thou shouldest besiege 20. 19 Gr. one city.a city many days to prevail against it by war to take it, thou shalt not destroy its trees, by applying an iron tool to them, but thou shalt eat of it, and shalt not cut it down: Is the tree that is in the field a man, to enter 20. 19 Gr. against thee.before thee into 20. 19 Gr. the trench. See Mat. 3. 10.the work of the siege?
